dict.string: PersonalAgent needs access to your calendar to help manage events and appointments.
PersonalAgent needs access to your reminders to help you manage tasks.
PersonalAgent needs access to your calendar to help manage events and appointments.
PersonalAgent needs access to your reminders to help you manage tasks.
PersonalAgent needs access to your contacts to help you find and manage contact information.
PersonalAgent uses automation to control other apps and perform system tasks.
